title: Space Engineers v01.036.009 by VIruz

- MP Instructions can be found here.

====================================================================================================
Description:
Space Engineers is a sandbox game about engineering, construction and maintenance of space works. 
Players build space ships and space stations of various sizes and utilization (civil and military), pilot ships and perform asteroid mining.

Fixes:
